abstract: Two influential proxy advisers issued opposing recommendations on Tuesday in the contentious boardroom battle between the activist investor William A. Ackman and Target, the nation’s second largest retailer.
snippet: Two influential proxy advisers issued opposing recommendations on Tuesday in the contentious boardroom battle between the activist investor William A. Ackman and Target, the nation’s second largest retailer.
lead_paragraph: Two influential proxy advisers issued opposing recommendations on Tuesday in the contentious boardroom battle between the activist hedge fund manager William A. Ackman and Target, the nation’s second largest retailer after Wal-Mart.

headline.main: Proxy Advisers Split in Ackman-Target Fight
